doc.title: Kasarmu Ce: This Land Is Ours
doc.plot: A West African thriller that draws on the traditions of Hausa and Western-style storytelling. The plot centers on the efforts of a young man to avenge the murder of his grandfather. The murderer is a brutal land baron attempting to seize control of the iron-rich village lands. Set within a rural African setting, the film is a "political, cultural and contemplative" thriller.
